title: Labor force

title: Labor force participation rate
description: Percentage of the population, of working age, in the labor force, see https://data.oecd.org/emp/labour-force.htm

title: Unemployment rate
description: Percentage of the population, of working age, who are unemployed.

description: Percentage of the working age population that is unemployed in urban vs. rural areas.

description: Worker vs nonworker population

description: Percentage of the population below poverty

title: Children in employment
description: Number of children who are employed

description: Number of children who are employed, broken down by gender

title: Unemployment rate by gender
description: Percentage of the population, of working age, who are unemployed. Broken down by gender

title: Gross domestic product per capita
description: Gross domestic product (nominal) per capita, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gross_domestic_product

title: Gross domestic product growth rate
description: Annual percentage growth rate of GDP at market prices based on constant local currency

title: Gross national income per capita (purchasing power parity)
description: Gross national income, divided by population, converted using purchasing power parity rates

title: Gross national income (purchasing power parity)
description: Gross national income, converted using purchasing power parity rates

title: Government debt
description: Amount of government debt

relatedChart.title: Government debt per capita
relatedChart.description: Government debt divided by the population

description: Government expenditures on education as a percentage of government expenditure

description: Government expenditures on education as a percentage of GDP

description: Amount spent by a government on the military

description: Amount spent by a government on the military as a percentage of GDP

title: Market capitalization of domestic companies (% of GDP)
description: Market capitalization of domestic companies (as a percentage of GDP)

title: Inward remittance
description: Total amount of inward remittance into a place

description: Total amount of inward remittance into a place (as a percentage of GDP)

title: Outward remittance
description: Total amount of outward remittance from a place

title: Individual income
description: Count of people whose individual incomes are in certain buckets

description: Median incomes of households

description: Mean monthly worker wages

description: Mean monthly wages in urban vs. rural areas.

title: Life expectancy (years)
description: Life expectancy of an individual, measured in years

title: Health outcomes
description: Percentage of people who are aflicted by certain negative health outcomes, e.g. high cholesterol or arthritis

description: Percentage of people who report certain negative health behaviors, e.g. obesity, smoking or binge drinking
